# ENV

| Linter                                | Configuration key           |
|---------------------------------------|-----------------------------|

## Configuration in Mega-Linter

| Variable                 | Description                   | Default value |
|--------------------------|-------------------------------|---------------|
| ENV_FILTER_REGEX_INCLUDE | Custom regex including filter |               |
| ENV_FILTER_REGEX_EXCLUDE | Custom regex excluding filter |               |
